contents.text: Welcome to CashBet, your East Bay partner for legal and profitable iGaming operations.
If you are an existing operator, press '1' for operator support.
For technical support and platform integration, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team in East Bay.

navigationGoals: Need to fix an API integration issue causing platform downtime
I need help troubleshooting my platform integration issues.
I need support with API integration and platform deployment for our operator environment.
I need someone to walk me through integrating my gaming platform account with your system.
I need help fixing timeout errors in my platform’s API integration.

contents.text: For compliance, regulatory, and legal questions, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our compliance specialists.

navigationGoals: Clarify updated regulatory requirements for my operator account
I need clarity on the compliance regulations for my operator license.
I need details on AML/KYC compliance and regulatory reporting for our gaming operations.
I’d like clear guidance on the regulatory and legal requirements for my operation.
I have questions about California AML and KYC compliance for operators.

contents.text: If you are interested in our services, press '2' for sales and licensing inquiries.
For information on licensing and legal setup, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our licensing team.

navigationGoals: Learn the process and fees for obtaining a new gaming license
I want details on how to obtain a gaming license and set up legally.
I want to discuss licensing prerequisites and jurisdictional registration for our iGaming platform.
I want help understanding how to obtain the proper license to use your services.
I want to apply for an East Bay iGaming operator license and need guidance.

contents.text: For product demos and profitability consultations, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales and consulting team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo and review projected profitability
I'd like to book a product demo and discuss profitability strategies.
I'd like a technical walkthrough and ROI projection for your gaming solution.
Could I get a product demo and talk with someone about profitability options?
I’d like to schedule a demo of your profitability analytics tools for my betting service.
